Ãƒâ€¦Ã‚Â»ywioÃƒâ€¦Ã¢â‚¬Å¡ak - Nowa Ex-Tradycja

This band fuses rock with a very archaic side of folk, though they are not only loud but also absolutely melodic and bearing great singers, great musicians, great arrangements. In a very good sense they are the first band ever that reminds me of the swedish phenomenon called Hedningarna and their greatest release "TrÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¤" which stands for me as _the_ 90's one and only album milestone leaving even Nirvana far behind. Like Zywiolak are also using mainly female vocals plus sometimes male. This makes a very nice blend. The difference is that Zywiolak are much more melting folk with Rock and are using - if I hear right - an electronic Bass, but alike this is music both fans of Folk and Rock will love because it does only contain the best of both worlds. This is no half-hearted chrossover, this is great music!!!

you could buy it in the greater part of Polish music shops or here: www.karrot.pl/ang/zywiolak
